AppLayout.footerDescription: The smartest, easiest way to explore the world. Your AI-powered travel planner to become a conscious traveler.
AppLayout.copyright: © 2024 TripMind. All rights reserved. Plan Smart. Travel Green.

AuthDialog.title: Welcome to TripMind
AuthDialog.description: Sign in or create an account to save and plan your trips.

DashboardPage.heroDescription: Your intelligent travel companion that helps you discover hidden gems, book eco-friendly transport, and create unforgettable experiences—all while keeping your carbon footprint low.
DashboardPage.featuresDescription: Powerful features designed to make your travel planning seamless and sustainable.
DashboardPage.feature1Description: Smart itineraries tailored to your preferences, budget, and travel style.
DashboardPage.feature2Description: Discover authentic experiences from local artisans and guides.
DashboardPage.feature3Description: Uncover secret spots and off-the-beaten-path destinations.
DashboardPage.topDestinationsDescription: Explore the most popular destinations trending among travelers worldwide.
DashboardPage.storiesDescription: Get inspired by real travelers and learn from their experiences.
DashboardPage.story1Description: A guide to staying safe and sane on your solo adventures.
DashboardPage.story2Title: How I Traveled Southeast Asia on a Budget
DashboardPage.story2Description: My journey through Vietnam, Cambodia and beyond for under $1,000.
DashboardPage.story3Description: Espresso-hunting in the quiet, cozy corners of the continent.
DashboardPage.moreFeaturesDescription: Everything you need for a perfect trip.
DashboardPage.feature5Description: Connect with real locals for help

AboutPage.title: About TripMind
AboutPage.subtitle: The smarter, greener, easier way to explore
AboutPage.visionP1: TripMind was born from a simple idea: travel should be both exciting and responsible. We believe that technology can help us explore the world while protecting it for future generations.
AboutPage.visionP2: Our AI-powered platform makes it easy to plan trips that are not only memorable but also sustainable. From finding hidden gems to calculating carbon footprints, we put the power of smart travel in your hands.
AboutPage.visionP3: Built for Hackathon 2025, TripMind represents our commitment to innovation, sustainability, and creating meaningful travel experiences that connect people with places and cultures.
AboutPage.missionStatement: "To empower travelers with AI-driven insights that make every journey smarter, greener, and more enriching—while supporting local communities and protecting our planet."

BookingPage.title: My Bookings
BookingPage.description: Manage all your confirmed rides and experiences with local supporters.

DestinationPage.planDescription: Ready to explore {destinationName}? Find the best transport options to make your trip happen.

ExpensesPage.title: Group Expense Splitter
ExpensesPage.description: Keep track of who paid for what. Add expenses below to automatically calculate the balance.
ExpensesPage.expenseLogDescription: A list of all shared expenses for this trip.
ExpensesPage.balanceSummaryDescription: Calculations based on equal splitting. Positive means they are owed money, negative means they owe money.

HiddenGemsPage.title: Hidden Gems Explorer
HiddenGemsPage.description: Venture off the beaten path. Uncover authentic local spots and experiences that guidebooks won't show you.
HiddenGemsPage.formDescription: Enter a destination and your interests to begin.
HiddenGemsPage.interestsPlaceholder: e.g., Vintage shops, seafood, scenic viewpoints
HiddenGemsPage.toastErrorDescription: Failed to find gems. Please try again.
HiddenGemsPage.toastSpontaneityDescription: Please enter a destination to be spontaneous!

ItineraryPlannerPage.title: AI Itinerary Generator
ItineraryPlannerPage.description: Let our AI craft the perfect, personalized travel plan for you. Just enter your preferences below and watch the magic happen.
ItineraryPlannerPage.formDescription: Fill in the form to get started.
ItineraryPlannerPage.interestsPlaceholder: e.g., Interested in historic temples, local cuisine, nature walks, and minimal travel between locations.
ItineraryPlannerPage.toastErrorDescription: Failed to generate itinerary. Please try again.
ItineraryPlannerPage.resultDescription: Your AI-generated travel plan will appear here.
ItineraryPlannerPage.waitingMessage: Your itinerary is waiting to be created.

SuggestBookingsPage.title: Suggest Transport Bookings
SuggestBookingsPage.description: Find the best way to get from A to B. Compare flights, trains, and buses to find the smartest, greenest option for your journey.
SuggestBookingsPage.formDescription: Tell us where you’re traveling from and to, and we’ll find the best options for you.
SuggestBookingsPage.noResults: No Options Found. Try changing your search criteria.
SuggestBookingsPage.localTransportDescription: Best ways to move around your destination city.
SuggestBookingsPage.loadingMessage: Searching for the best options for you...

TripPlannerPage.title: AI Trip Planner
TripPlannerPage.description: Tell us about your dream trip, and our AI will craft a detailed, day-by-day itinerary just for you.
TripPlannerPage.formDescription: The more details you provide, the better your personalized plan will be.
TripPlannerPage.interestsPlaceholder: e.g., Art museums, street food, hiking, local markets...
TripPlannerPage.toastErrorDescription: Failed to generate trip plan. Please try again.
TripPlannerPage.loginToPlan: Please log in to plan a trip.
TripPlannerPage.toastLoginDescription: You need to be logged in to plan a trip.
TripPlannerPage.loadingMessage: Finding the best options for you...
